data.message: Facebook or Apple needs to do whatever it takes to allow iPad to work properly with Facebook! I don't know who's needs to make the repair, I just know I've tried everything suggested and I still can't see very much on Facebook and it takes for ever to load, takes 2-3 tries! Just in case you read this. It seems you could care less bout your subscribers. You didn't take time to read the last one I sent!
